text: This is a list of universities in Mongolia. * Mongolia National University (MNU)https://muis.mn/ * Construction Technology College * Darkhan Institute, Darkhan (city) * Defense University of Mongolia * Ulaanbaatar State Defense University * German-Mongolian Institute for Resources and Technology, Ulaanbaatar - Nailakhhttp://www.gmit.edu.mn/ *Global Leadership University, Ulaanbaatar * Great Mongol University/ Ikh Mongol University * Ider University, Ulaanbaatar * University of Finance and Economics of Mongolia * Mongolia International University * Mongolian Academy of Sciences * Mongolian Business Institute * Mongolian National University, Ulaanbaatar https://muis.mn/ * Mongolian State University of Agriculture, Ulaanbaatar * Mongolian State University of Education, Ulaanbaatarhttp://www.msue.edu.mn/ * Mongolian National University of Medical Sciences, Ulaanbaatarhttp://www.mnums.edu.mn/ * Mongolian Technical University, Ulaanbaatar * Mongolian University of Science and Technology * Ulaanbaatar State University, Ulaanbaatarhttp://www.usu.edu.mn/ * National University of Mongolia, Ulaanbaatar * The Seruuleg Institute, Ulaanbaatarhttp://seruuleg.edu.mn/ * Ulaanbaatar University, Ulaanbaatarhttp://www.ulaanbaatar.edu.mn/ * University of the Humanities, Ulaanbaatar * Guren Graduate Institute, Ulaanbaatarhttp://www.guren.edu.mn/ * Graduate University of Mongolia, Ulaanbaatarhttp://www.gradedu.mn/ * Raffles International Institute, Ulaanbaatarhttp://www.raffles.mn/ * Law Enforcement University of Mongolia ==References== Universities * Mongolia Mongolia
title: List of universities in Mongolia
